thread.title: Rustik Bistro & Bar To Offer Food HoursTravelandtourworld.com
thread.title_full: Rustik Bistro & Bar To Offer Food HoursTravelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Rustik Bistro & Bar To Offer Food HoursTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Rustik Bistro & Bar To Offer Food Hours Published on : Tuesday, October 13, 2015
Rustik Bistro & Bar of Harper Kuta intoduces a new dining option with its exciting “Food Hours“ menu on month of October 2015. A simple yet tasteful four selection of grab snacks from the offer is the perfect meal setting while sunbathing or relaxing with friends and family on the pool side.
The Food Hours will offer extraordinary offer of buy 1 get 1 free and available between 3.00 p.m to 8.00 p.m, with selections of Triple Decker Sandwich, Hot Dog, Pizza, and Fried Potato.
“ Food hours is a way to define Rustik Bistro & Bar to our customers who want to be delighted with mouth-watering snacks while enjoying their time by the pool. We offer this menu starting at 30.000 rupiah, and it would be a very great deal on this month. ” said Chossy Muhar, F&B Manager of Harper Kuta Bali Hotel .
Rustik Bistro & Bar was built out of a passion to create a dining experience unlike any other. A dining experience where quality, local and regionally sourced food, tropical rustic atmosphere, and diverse choices offer guests the opportunity to create their own unforgettable dining experience. Executive Chef, Lukas Harry, and his expert culinary team have crafted a menu focusing on locally and regionally sourced ingredients.
